description: Sweet Cinnamon Twists are a delightful pastry treat that combines the flakiness of puff pastry with a gooey, sweet cinnamon filling. Perfect for breakfast, dessert, or a sweet snack with your coffee, these twists are sure to impress with their delicious taste and Instagram-worthy appearance.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Roll out the puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to about 1/8 inch thick.
In a small bowl, mix the granulated sugar and cinnamon together.
Brush the rolled-out pastry with the melted butter, then sprinkle the cinnamon-sugar mixture generously over the surface.
Cut the dough into 1-inch wide strips. Twist each strip several times, then place them on the prepared baking sheet.
Brush each twist with an egg wash (optional) and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown and puffed up.
Allow the twists to cool slightly, then dust with powdered sugar if desired and serve immediately.
tips: For perfect results, ensure your oven is fully preheated before baking and keep an eye on the twists to prevent burning.
